channel.title: Npc drops help [474]
channel.description:
i have got this as my npc-drops log #Graardor drop = 6260 532:1:ALWAYS 995:6000:12000:COMMON 3024:4:COMMON 1127:1:UNCOMMON 385: 3:COMMON 11710:1:VERY_RARE 11712:1:VERY_RARE
and when i change it to this because the other one isn't working with the drop rates //hill giant drop = 117 532 1 100 drop = 117 995 6581 90 drop = 117 995 12382 85 drop = 117 995 21297 80 drop = 117 3024 4 86 drop = 117 1127 1 60 drop = 117 385 4 78 drop = 117 11710 1 50 drop = 117 11712 1 50 drop = 117 11714 1 50 drop = 117 11724 1 35 drop = 117 11726 1 35 drop = 117 11728 1 35
i get this error Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "117 532" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Num berFormatException. java:65) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:580) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:615) at server.game.npcs.NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandle r.java:148) at server.game.npcs.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java :45) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:102) Press any key to continue . . .
when i remove drop = 117 532 1 100 from the npc drop list it says the same error but with a different item
any help please

item.title: Npc drops help [474]
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

whether the format works or not, is another issue.

the issue you have at hand, java.lang.NumberFormatException is being thrown due to you inputting an unknown / non-parseable format to the data.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc drops help [474]
item.dc:creator: @swiftclanhype swiftclanhype
item.description:
@swiftclanhype wrote:

Vain_:

you have to use the same format

the common very rare rare uncommon doesn’t work how would i change it if i did 532:1:100 would that work because i put bondos tasset from rare to super rare but it still drops it in like 3kills

Read full topic

item.title: Npc drops help [474]
item.dc:creator: @swiftclanhype swiftclanhype
item.description:
@swiftclanhype wrote:

i have got this as my npc-drops log
#Graardor
drop = 6260 532:1:ALWAYS 995:6000:12000:COMMON 3024:4:COMMON 1127:1:UNCOMMON 385: 3:COMMON 11710:1:VERY_RARE 11712:1:VERY_RARE

and when i change it to this because the other one isn’t working with the drop rates
//hill giant
drop = 117 532 1 100
drop = 117 995 6581 90
drop = 117 995 12382 85
drop = 117 995 21297 80
drop = 117 3024 4 86
drop = 117 1127 1 60
drop = 117 385 4 78
drop = 117 11710 1 50
drop = 117 11712 1 50
drop = 117 11714 1 50
drop = 117 11724 1 35
drop = 117 11726 1 35
drop = 117 11728 1 35

i get this error
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError
Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "117 532"
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Num berFormatException.
java:65)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:580)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:615)
at server.game.npcs.NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandle r.java:148)
at server.game.npcs.NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java :45)
at server.Server.(Server.java:102)
Press any key to continue . . .

when i remove drop = 117 532 1 100 from the npc drop list it says the same error but with a different item

any help please

Read full topic
